message: Meet me halfway, Bob! Let's split the money evenly.
You can have 300k, it's a generous offer, but I'm worth more!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much. Meet me in the middle again!
I'll give you 400k, but I'm not budging any further!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll give you a slightly larger share. Don't think you're getting off that easy, though!
I'm getting impatient, but I'll give you a bit more. Don't think you can get more than this!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet! Take a smaller share, and let's end this!
You're getting close to desperation, but I'm not backing down. This is my last generous offer!
I'm not going to give up! Take a smaller share, and let's end this before it's too late!
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my last serious offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down! Take a smaller share, and let's end this before I'm left with nothing!
This is my last chance. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing. The choice is yours, Alice.
